name: My Dog Skip
description: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

review.author: helpless_dancer
review.heading: Heartwarming heartbreaker
review.reviewBody: Anybody who had a close friend during childhood who happened to be a canine should go for this one. Like most of the pooch films it was corny in spots, but at least Skip wasn't endowed with human intelligence. Of course, the mean men were around to cause trouble for the dog and boy; can't get by without them. Fun movie, but be sure to bring along a crying towel.
